column10: ja:"その昔…　母星で枯渇してしまった生命エネルギー「アルビトリウム」を求め別次元から機械生命体が来訪した。機械生命体達は次元超越に耐える為その姿を腕だけに収縮し、アルビトリウムが豊富にあるとされる地球に降り立つ。彼らは他の生物に合体寄生することにより地球での活動を可能とした。そして一部の人類と秘密裏にコンタクトを取り、アルビトリウムの探索に乗り出した。 人はその姿から彼らを「メカウデ」と呼んだ。 そして時を経て現代。とあるメカウデが封印されたキューブが、大企業カガミグループの研究施設から持ち出され失われてしまう。それを偶然見つけてしまった普通の中学生「ヒカル」はキューブの封印を解いてしまう。 そこから現れたのは長い眠りについていたメカウデ「アルマ」だった。アルマはヒカルの体に寄生しようとするが… ひょんなことからヒカルとアルマの奇妙な共同生活が始まってしまう。"}

column19: ja:"あの”犯人”が主役のクリミナル・ギャグ！犯罪都市、米花町―――世界トップレベルの事件数が発生するこの町に降り立った、漆黒の人影…標的に近づくべく上京してきたようだが、全てが謎に包まれている。その人物の名は…犯人の犯沢さん（仮名）！『名探偵コナン』でおなじみ、全身黒タイツのようなビジュアルの”犯人”…誰もが知ってるアイツが主役の漫画がスタートして以来、ネット上で話題沸騰！人気アンケート１位を独走し、さらには単行本発売前に日清とコラボし、朝のニュース番組で取り上げられるなど、異例のスピードで認知度を上げている、唯一にして正統なる（？）コナンスピンオフ漫画！"

column110: zh:"电视动画《闪烁的青春》改编自日本漫画家咲坂伊绪的同名漫画。在漫画杂志《别册Margaret》2014年2月号（1月11日发售）上，正式发表了《闪烁的青春》TV动画化的决定。电视动画于2014年7月7日首播，全12集。 故事主要讲述的是对于不擅长与男生打交道的主人公吉冈双叶来说，“田中君”是特别的存在。由于在暑假时田中君转校了，所以双叶未能向他传达自己内心的感情。之后，受到男生欢迎的双叶也因此被其他女生排挤，就这样度过了难受的中学时代。升入高中以后，为了不被女生讨厌而故意做出一些粗心大意的举动的双叶，与她的初恋对象“田中君”重逢。然而，田中君在初中时的性格也已改变了，故事便由此展开。"
column111: zh-hk:"故事主要講述的是對於不擅長與男生打交道的主人公吉岡雙葉來説，“田中君”是特別的存在。由於在暑假時田中君轉校了，所以雙葉未能向他傳達自己內心的感情。之後，受到男生歡迎的雙葉也因此被其他女生排擠，就這樣度過了難受的中學時代。升入高中以後，為了不被女生討厭而故意做出一些粗心大意的舉動的雙葉，與她的初戀對象“田中君”重逢。然而，田中君在初中時的性格也已改變了，故事便由此展開。"}

column18: ja:"この世界の人々は15歳になると、女神様から《ギフト》と呼ばれる様々な能力を与えられる。貴族家の三男・アルマも優秀な《ギフト》を授かることを期待されていたが、なぜか《ギフト》はまったく発現せず、実家から無能と蔑まれ追い出されてしまう…。だが、実はアルマは特別な《ギフト》を授かっていたーー。その能力《転生者》によって前世の記憶と能力を取り戻したアルマは、この世界で最強の魔法使いとなった！一度目の人生の全てを魔法の探究に捧げたアルマが、前世で極めた魔法で”幸せな二度目の人生”へと歩み出す！"}

column17: zh:"《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》\n\n随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。"}

column18: description:{"en":"Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world
column19: a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth
column20: and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills
column21: he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door
column22: the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There
column23:
he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

column49: ru:"10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун

column41: zh:"花季少女表白温柔女前辈，\n谁曾想前辈竟然是男生！？\n作为男生的花岗真琴从小喜欢一些可爱的东西，因为外表秀气，他经常把自己装扮为女生。某天，女主苍井咲突然向女装的真琴表白，真琴主动说出自己是男生。苍井咲本以为自己喜欢女生但当得知真琴是男生的这一刻，她下定决心更要主动出击追到真琴！"
column42: zh-hk:"蒼井咲對一見鍾情的學姊花岡真琴告白後，意外發現對方竟是男兒身。遭到真琴拒絕後，咲沒有放棄追求，反而越挫越勇，並與真琴的青梅竹馬龍二相識。一段特殊的情感在三個人之間蕩漾開來！"}

description:{"en":"Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita
column59: 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**\nA strange world where aliens have taken over the human world
column60: and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.\n\n- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa
column61: 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**\nTo Sasaki
column62: his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true
column63: no matter how low the odds. Yet one day
column64: trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation
column65: Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.\n\n- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku
column66:
恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody
column67: 人魚ラプソディ)**\nIn a world where sirens are common
column68: the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea
column69: when a strange siren approaches him…\n\n- Chapter 2. **\"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl\" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou
column70:
目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta
column71: 予言のナユタ)**\nA tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world

column21: pt-br:"Tudo se passa no continente de **Cruzon**

column32: o garoto se dará conta da responsabilidade que recaiu sobre seus ombros e da importância que sua intervenção pode ter na guerra em Cruzon."
column34: где правит \"магия\". Здесь не добывают нефть. Здесь не вырабатывают электричество. Основным ресурсом этого мира и двигателем производства стал кварц - добываемый минерал. Люди очищают совместимый кварц и создают кварцевые двигатели и ускорители
column35: которые двигают механизмы. Всё - от движков могучих \"големов\" до поршней пневматических винтовок. У всех была эта сила - отдавать приказы кварцу. Люди называли её \"магией\". В этом мире родиться \"без магии\" равносильно неизлечимой болезни.\nРайгарт - один из немногих несчастных

column39: wanita naif yang kerap dimanfaatkan oleh orang sekitarnya berubah drastis. Setelah dia mengalami kecelakaan dan sekarat
column40: dia merasuk ke dalam tubuh wanita jahat bernama Deborah Seymour. Deborah Seymour adalah seorang tokoh di novel reverse harem rating 19+ berjudul 'A Dark Thorn Through My Throat'. Karena tidak ingin ada orang lain yang tahu kalau sebenarnya Yoon Dohee adalah wanita naif
column41:
dia akhirnya belajar untuk menjadi jahat seperti Deborah Seymour. "Aku tidak akan hidup sebagai orang yang baik dan menyedihkan seperti di masa lalu. Aku akan terus hidup enak sebagai wanita jahat!"

column44: uk:"Ду Хі опанувала тіло лиходійки одного непопулярного роману
column45:
яка була відома і ненависна всім за свої погані вчинки. Але через власний характер їй дуже важко правильно грати роль злодійки. Але ненадовго.. 

"Я зміню сукню згідно з вашим смаком негайно" 

"Моє прохання." 

"З-звісно! Згідно з вашим запитом
column46: у всій імперії є лише одна річ.\" \n\nЛюди навколо мене добре слухають
column47: навіть якщо я просто хмурюсь і сиджу на місці. Оскільки мені не доводиться жити в труднощах
column48: я вирішила просто комфортно жити у тілі лиходійки. \n\n«Батько
column49: чи потрібно вам розв’язувати формули таким повільним і неефективним способом?» \n\nЯ подумала
column50: що було б добре бути багатою негідницею
column51:
тому використовувала усі свої знання. 

«Чому б вам не надати мені честь супроводжувати принцесу?» 

У мене досить багато справ з батьком
column52: так чому раптом з’явився цей неочікуваний персонаж? Що
column53:
якщо ця людина спробує порушити мій план?

column8: description:{"en":"Set on a solitary island in the distant sea
column9: a dangerous school life begins!\n\nKaoru Jahana
column10: a boy who aspires to become a true man
column11: begins his high school life on a solitary island in the sea. There
column14: who is actually a demon who feeds on men's spirits...and it turns out that all the women on this island are the same demons!?"}

column15: description:{"en":"Fujiyama-san is 181 cm (approx. 5' 11'') and she is the ace player for her middle-school's volleyball team. Kanba-kun is 160 cm (approx. 5' 3\") and has known Fujiyama since their preschool years. With his prankster friends
column16: Kanba peeks into the girl's locker room right when Fujiyama is undressing. From then on
column17: he could not get the image of Fujiyama out of his mind
column18: so he decides to ask her out. She says yes. Enjoy their naive and secretive relationship as Kanba ogles his tall girlfriend in many different situations."
column19: pt-br:"Fujiyama-san tem 1m 81cm de altura e ela é a jogadora ás da equipe de vôlei de sua escola. Kanba-kun de 1m 60cm de altura e é conhecido da Fujiyama desde o jardim de infância. Com seus amigos pervertidos
column20: Kanba tenta espiar o vestiário feminino quando vê Fujiyama se despindo. A partir de então
column21: ele não consegue tirar a imagem da Fujiyama de sua mente
column22: então ele decide convidá-la para saírem. E ela diz aceita
column23: para sua surpresa. Desfrute de seu relacionamento ingênuo e secreto do garoto baixinho e sua namorada alta em muitas situações diferentes

column15: description:{"en":"The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   \r\n  \r\nOriginal comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821)

column25: description:{"en":"When I opened my eyes I had become the duchess.\n  \nBut something isn’t right. I went as far as becoming a character but I’m just a duchess in name that gets mistreated by the maids and ignored by her husband. What a crappy life! Gosh
column26: I don’t know what to do anymore. I’ll just quietly enjoy my tea
column27:
was what I thought.
  
“Can you prepare tea for me again next time?”
  
Something’s gone wrong with my cold husband!

column48: empregados que a menosprezam e um marido insensível. Quando uma funcionária de escritório (e uma ingênua em recuperação) acorda como Chloe

column50:
então vamos fazer uma festa do chá! Cada xícara é perfeitamente feita para acabar com os preconceitos e com o favoritismo pelo café – e servida com uma pitada de seu conhecimento de negócios – mas será isso o suficiente para atrair a atenção de seu marido e trazer a Chloe o respeito que ela merece? Venha tomar chá com Chloe!

column2: title:{"en":"The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero"}
column15:
description:{"en":"There once was a hero who was deemed the strongest on Earth.

“But he died. How would someone that we killed return?”
“Yeah. I’d love to see him try and come back.”

However
column17:
he actually returned!

“Why are you guys so shocked? Did you do something that you feel guilty about?”

‘These motherfuckers. I’m not going to let them be.’

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy4PeK3mCrI)"
column18:
fr:"Il était une fois un héros qui considéré autre fois comme le plus puissant de la Terre.

« Mais il est mort… Comment une personne désignée comme morte pourrait-il revenir ? »
« Ouais
column21: il revint.\n\n« Pourquoi êtes-vous aussi choqués
column22: les gars ? À voir vos gueules
column23: on pourrait croire que vous vous sentez coupable ? »\n\n‘Ces enfoirés… je vais pas les laisser s’en tirer comme ça…’"
column24:
ko:"지상에 최강의 영웅이 있었다.

“하지만 죽었잖아. 우리가 죽인 놈이 어떻게 돌아와?”
“그러게. 돌아올 수 있으면 한번 돌아와 보라지.”

그런데 20년 만에 진짜 돌아와 버렸다?

“뭘 그리 놀래? 왜. 양심에 찔릴 짓이라도 하셨나?”

이 XX들. 가만 안 둔다.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sy4PeK3mCrI)"
column25:
pt-br:"Eu era o maior herói da Terra.

“Mas ele está morto. Como aquele cara que matamos está de volta?”

“Não sei.”

Eu realmente voltei depois de 20 anos?

“Por que estão tão surpresos? Fizeram algo para ficar com a consciência pesada?”

Seus desgraçados. Vocês não perdem por esperar."}

column14: description:{"en":"I reincarnated into a novel… but
column15:
hey… What am I supposed to do if I reincarnate in 10 years before the novel begins?

The location: prison. The problem is that even a jungle is better than this place!

After ten years finally passed
column16:
I became the top dog in this prison. 

*
“Hey Mint. Cut it out. Don’t go overboard.”

“I have no idea what you’re talking about.”

I became a good-for-nothing leader
column17: but I’m fine with that. That’s a privilege a pro gets. \n\n“I’ll make you dead on paper
column18:
so do me one last favour.”
“I have no idea what you’re on about.”

A golden opportunity was bestowed upon me. 

“If you help me
column19: I’ll release you from prison.”\n“What do you want me to do
column20:
Master?”
“...”

The chief of the prison asked me
column22:
for a favor.

“Make the new guy coming into the leader of this prison.”

It may be called a prison
column24: it’s a lawless place. If I can make one man into the leader
column25: I can finally be released.\n\n“But to do that
column26:
you need to enter a male prison.”
“...Huh? How can I attach something that’s not there and get in?”

But oh god? The new guy is the male lead of the original novel."
column28:
저기요.
원작보다 10년 일찍 빙의해 버리면 어쩌란 말입니까?

장소는 감옥.
문제는 여기
column29:
정글보다 더한 곳이다!

그렇게 구르고 굴러 10년 뒤.
나는
column31:
민트. 작작해라. 작작.”
“뭘 말씀하시는지 모르겠지 말입니다.”

껄렁껄렁한 우두머리가 되어 버렸다.
하지만 나는 이래도 괜찮다. 고인물의 특권이다.

“서류상 죽은 걸로 해 주마. 대신 일을 하나 해 줘야겠다.”
“무슨 말인지 모르겠지 말입니다.”

그러다 거짓말처럼 찾아온 기회.

“도와주면 출소시켜 주지.”
“뭘 할까요
column32:
주인님?”
“…….”

감방의 책임자가 감방의 또라이가 되어버린 내게 주문했다.

“앞으로 들어오는 새로운 신입
column33:
그놈을 이 감방의 우두머리로 만들어.”

말이 감방이지. 여긴 무법지대.
이곳에서 한 남자를 우두머리로 만들면 드디어 나는 출소한다. 

“그런데 네가 들어가야 할 곳은 남자 교도소다.”
“……엥? 없는 걸 어떻게 달고 가요?”
“변장이지
column34:
변장!”

그런데 아뿔싸? 
새로운 신삥이 원작 남주였을 줄이야.

#원작보다 10년 일찍 빙의해 버렸다
#게다가 눈떠 보니 감방?! 살아남아라!
#젠장
column36: 짠! 감방의 짱이 되었습니다 #그런데 신삥이 남주네?\n#집착 연하남과 무심 여주의 팽팽한 티키타카"
column37: pt-br:"*Mesma autora da Novel de \u003cI met the male lead in prison\u003e; \u003cOnly treat villainess\u003e;\n\nEu fui engolida por um livro… Não
column38: como assim? E ele me engoliu 10 anos antes da história original? O lugar é uma prisão. O problema é esse
column39: um lugar pior que a selva! Passando o tempo
column40: 10 anos depois. Eu me tornei o chefe da prisão. \n\n“Ei
column42:
trabalhe.” 

“Eu não sei do que está falando.”

Ele se tornou um chefe desajeitado
column43:
mas estou bem com isso. É o privilégio dos falecidos. 

“Fingirei que estou morta no papel. Eu tenho que fazer algo por você”

“Não sei o que quer dizer.”

Então a oportunidade veio como uma mentira. 

“Se você me ajudar
column44: te tirarei daqui.”\n\n“O que devemos fazer
column45:
mestre?”

“….”

A pessoa responsável pela cela ordenou que eu me tornasse um idiota na prisão. 

“Um novo recruta está vindo
column46: faça-o chefe da prisão.”\n\nPalavras são uma cela de prisão. Esta é uma área sem lei. Se eu fizer um homem o chefe
column47:
eu finalmente serei libertada. 

“Mas o lugar que você deve entrar é uma prisão masculina.”

“…. o quê?”

“Como você usa algo que não tem?”

“É um disfarce! Disfarce!”

Mas que vergonha? Eu teria pensado que o novo recruta teria sido o protagonista original. 

 

Eu entrei em um livro 10 anos antes que o original. Quando acordei
column48: eu estava numa cela de prisão?! Sobreviva! Droga
column50: voila! Me tornei o melhor na cela. A propósito
column51: o cara novo é homem? Tiki-taka acirrado de um jovem obsessivo e uma protagonista indiferente."}

column14:
Rubica dies without even confessing to her beloved Armand.

But what is this?

At the age of 22

which began to flow in a direction she never expected?

ja:"5歳の時母親が亡くなり、10歳の時伝染病で父親まで亡くなった少年「飛雲」。彼は彫刻家だった父からその才能を受け継いでいた。 両親の木像を作り、二人の墓の前にそなえたある日、それを見た老人から「自分を師匠にすれば天下一の武術を教えよう」と話しかけられる。怪しいとは思ったものの老人が見せた武術に惹かれその申し出を受けてしまった飛雲。案の定、武術などろくに教えず、訓練といいながら家事と金稼ぎばかり… そんなある日、女装して働いている酒楼で偶然武林盟主の娘である「羅 香凜」の命を救った。飛雲は男であることを隠して香凜と親しくなるが…

column20: ko:"홀로 길러주신 아버지를 돌림병으로 잃고 10세의 어린 나이에 혈혈단신이 된 비류연.\n조각가였던 아버지에게 배운 기술로 부모님의 조각상을 만들어 두 분의 묘 앞에 세워두는데
column21:
지나가던 노인이 그걸 보더니 자신을 사부로 삼으면 천하제일 무공을 가르쳐주겠다고 한다.

수상쩍지만 달리 갈 곳도 없고
column22:
그럴듯해 보이는 무공에 혹해 비류연은 그를 따라가고 마는데…

그날 이후 비류연을 길러준 것은 팔할이 바람이었다.

오늘 하루는 좀 편안했으면 좋겠다는 바람!
사부가 더 늙으면 울 때까지 구박해주겠다는 바람!
아니 다 필요 없고 여기서 탈출하고 싶다는 바람!
하늘이여 저한테 왜 이러세요 제발 살려주세요… 하는 바람!

하늘이 비류연의 바람을 들어준 것일까.
무식한 가사노동과 피골상접 과로사를 야기할 것 같던 돈벌이로 점철된 삶 속에서
깨알같이 사부 몰래 힘을 비축하던 비류연은 드디어 어느 날 깨닫는다.

‘오늘이 바로 그날이다!’

사부를 따돌릴 꿀떡(?)을 던져놓고는 무한한 용기를 발휘해 묵금과 비뢰도까지 다 들고 튄 비류연.

혹자는 강호를 두고 시산혈해 위에 암투로 쌓아올린 백척간두의 세계라고 하나
column23:
비류연에겐 드넓은 꿀 천지에 온실 속의 화초들이 노니는 안락한 신세계로만 보였는데…!

비류연의 행복은 과연 언제까지 갈 것인가!

column9: description:{"en":"An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams
column10: but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover
column11: he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!\n\nAfter her aptitude for healing magic was discovered
column12: she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic
column13: all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However
column15: she was attached to an assault squad
column16: repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the \"Western Front.\"\nThe mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace

column23:
ja:"FPSの元プロゲーマー♂が転生した世界は魔法が存在するファンタジー世界だった――が、そこには夢広がる冒険はなく、銃弾が飛び交う泥沼の戦場が待っていた！　しかも、トウリ・ノエルという名の孤児の「少女」として……!?

トウリは回復魔法への適性を見出され、生まれ育った孤児院への資金援助のため軍に志願し二等衛生兵となる。しかし魔法の訓練も受けないまま、彼女は最も過酷な戦闘が繰り広げられている「西部戦線」の突撃部隊へと配属されてしまう。
彼女に与えられた任務は戦線のエースであるガーバックの専属衛生兵となり、絶対に彼を死なせないこと。けれどガーバックは部下を見殺しにしてでも戦果を上げる最低の指揮官でもあった！

理不尽な命令と暴力が飛び交う戦場で、トウリはただ生き残るために奮闘するが――。"}

미래에 대마법사가 될 운명인 롤랜드와 그의 동생 멜리사. 
그리고 롤랜드의 재능을 착취하여 자신의 이익을 챙기려는 렝케. 
렝케의 감시를 피해서 롤랜드와 멜리사를 데리고 도망치겠어!
일단 렝케를 피해서 먼 도시로 도망치면 될 줄 알았는데…. 
아이들과의 관계가 어떻게 되냐고요? 
"저는… 이 아이들의 엄마예요! 
카리나 블로에입니다."
그렇게 겨우 도망친 곳이 왜 하필 클로드 공작의 영지인 거야?! 
인재만 보면 사족을 못 쓰고 영입하려 든다는 클로드 공작.

column17:
ja:"この愛のいきつく先は幸せか、それとも絶望かーー？
誰もが羨む理想のハイスぺ彼氏・伊織と交際し、公私ともに順風満帆な日々を送る透花。
交際スタートから1年、伊織から「一生側にいてほしい」と結婚の申し出を受ける。
喜びに浮かれる透花だったが、そんな時、誰かにストーキングされていることが発覚。
幼馴染の陣に協力してもらい犯人探しをするが……!?
24時間監視・盗聴・尾行…ヤンデレ男子の歪んだ愛と執着心の暴走が止まらないサイコロマンスが幕を開けるーー！

---
這段愛情的盡頭是幸福，抑或是絕望呢――？
與人人稱羨的理想極品男友·伊織交往，於公於私都過著順風順水的日子的透花。
開始交往後的１年，由伊織提出了「希望你能一輩子陪伴在右」的求婚。
沈浸在喜悅之中的透花，就在此時，發現似乎被誰給跟蹤著。
並在青梅竹馬的陣的幫助之下找尋犯人……！？
24小時監視·監聽·跟蹤…無法制止病嬌男子扭曲的愛與暴走的執著心之精神病羅曼史就此展開序幕――！"

column49: id:"Leandro hidupnya penuh kemalangan. Orang tua leandro menikah secara politik sehingga tidak ada cinta diantara keduanya. Oleh karena itu sejak kecil leandro tidak pernah merasakan cinta kasih dari orang tuanya. Pada saat umur 5 tahun ia terkena kutukan yang membuatnya sakit setiap harinya. Bahkan dimasa sulit itu orang tua leandro menatap tajam leandro dengan kebencian dan ketidak pedulian. Hidup tanpa cinta membuat hati leandro tertutup. Dia menjadi ketus dengan semua orang tak terkecuali para pembantunya. Suatu hari dia bertemu dengan Eleonora

物語を読み終えた私は、彼の悲運な結末に涙し眠りについたはずなのに…作中のメイド、「イベリナ」に憑依しちゃった――!?"

column143: vi:"Câu chuyện diễn ra vào thời Victoria. Ở ngoại thành London có một toàn lâu đài nguy nga vốn là nơi ở của gia tộc Phantomhive. Hiện giờ chủ nhân của toàn lâu đài đó là bá tước Ciel Phantomhive

column162: zh:"身为一个执事，连这种事都不会，那怎么成？ 英国的名门贵族法多姆凯贝家，有一位执事——锡巴斯查恩——不论是知识、教养、品位、料理、武术……他都样样精通， 面对那位任性的十二岁主人，漆黑的燕尾服在摇摆、摇摆…… 为您送上全世界 适合品尝着红茶欣赏的执事漫画……"}

column33: ja:"まだ“情熱”って言葉さえ知らない、小学校６年生の千早(ちはや)。そんな彼女が出会ったのは、福井からやってきた転校生・新(あらた)。おとなしくて無口な新だったが、彼には意外な特技があった。それは、小倉百人一首競技かるた。千早は、誰よりも速く誰よりも夢中に札を払う新の姿に衝撃を受ける。しかし、そんな新を釘付けにしたのは千早のずば抜けた「才能」だった……。まぶしいほどに一途な思いが交差する青春ストーリー、いよいよ開幕!!"
column35: o sonho de Chihaya era ver sua irmã se tornar a melhor modelo do Japão... Arata pratica uma versão competitiva do jogo de cartas tradicional Japonês (conhecido como Hyakunin Isshu) de um jeito que Chihaya nunca tinha visto antes. Após substituir Arata em uma partida

column24:
ko:"사상최초로 마계를 통일한 위대한 마왕 '엠빌던'.
제르에이라 왕국 유일의 후계자인 성격파탄자 라지에르에게 빙의되었다?!

역대 최강이라 불리는 113대 마왕 엠빌던은 어느 날 한 인간에게 소환된다.
하지만 소환자인 망나니 뚱보 왕자 '라지에르 루 제르에이라 로드윌'은 소환과 동시에 그대로 사망해 버렸고
결국 계약대행 의무에 의해 엠빌던은 라지에르의 몸에 강제로 빙의되고 마는데...


탐욕스러운 라지에르가 바란 소원은 두 가지.

첫째
column26:
제르에이라가 세상을 지배할 수 있도록 할 것.


마계로 돌아가기 위해 어쩔 수 없이 라지에르의 생전의 소원을 들어주기로 한 엠빌던.
라지에르가 되어 그 누구보다 강한 힘으로 제르에이라 왕국이 세상을 지배하게 되는 새로운 전설의 시작이......!


"살부터 빼야겠네."

...일단 다이어트부터 시작이다.

column9: description:{"en":"Ax is the premier Japanese magazine for alternative comics

column11: the pages of Ax contain the most innovative
column13: and personal works in contemporary manga - the flourishing underground of the world’s largest comics industry.  \n  \nAx has always published manga outside of the more commercial market and not followed manga conventions
column14:
thus the titles appearing in this magazine do NOT fall under any of the basic demographics (shoujo/shounen/seinen/josei).  
  
This landmark English publication volume includes work by 33 artists:

ずっと優しく接してくれた紫乃に対して康生は好意を抱いていた。

言葉は──

「裸…見せてくんない？」


小さな頃から想いを寄せていた姉の友達とラブラブエッチするお話です。

シチュや関係性ややり取りでドキドキできるものを目指して
描きました。"}

column60: en:"The story begins with a beautiful girl
column62: and the people who love her selfishly for it.  \n  \nWhat transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?"
column63: es:"'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.\n\n- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)"
column64: es-la:"La historia comienza con una hermosa chica
column65: su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.\n  \n¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino
column66: y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?"
column67: fa:"آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه."
column68: fr:"L'histoire commence avec une belle fille
column70:
et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?

column22:
description:{"en":"※ Be prepared for a world after death!

I  received a strange spam text message right before I died. I thought I was dead but when I opened my eyes I was at the transmigrated examination bureau.

There really is a world after death? I'll transmigrate to a book?!

"Do you have a particular genre you like?"

I
column23: who mastered a variety of genres in my previous life
column25: I hoped for a child-rearing novel where I can become a cute
column26:
dainty girl and acquire infinite love. 

ㅡ The book I'll transmigrate to isㅡ

Survival Difficulty S-class
column27:
an book full of regression instances *Regressing Until the World Is Saved*.

ㅡ And the character I will possess thereㅡ

is the daughter of a servant who serves the ruthless aristocrat familyㅡwho abused the main character?!

However
column28: thanks to \"the Life Insurance Full Package
column29: \" which I signed up for just before I died
column30: I got special privileges...\n\nThis is a story about surviving an S-class survival difficulty book with the help of new skills
column32:
and God's favoritism and affection that I've gained!

---
On the outside
column33: Ailette Rodeline is an adorable child prodigy. Cooking
column36: she can do it. But this little girl has a big secret: Ailette is a transmigrator! After dying prematurely in her past life
column37: she becomes a character whose world is destined for destruction. With all odds stacked against her
column38: Ailette must figure out how to survive before her life is ripped from her again. Fortunately for her
column39:
she finds her salvation in… an insurance package?

---

column45:
zh-hk:"應對死後世界!死前收到的奇怪的垃圾短信。以為死了，睜開眼以後發現身處附身審查局。

真的有死後世界?被附身在書裡?“你有什麼特別喜歡的類型嗎?” 前世因追星涉獵了所有題材的我。

雖然希望下輩子能成為養成系的可愛小女孩，獨占無限愛。但我要附的書是-生存難易度S級，充滿地瓜的無限復活系<直到拯救世界為止的複活>。

在那裡被附身的角色是-在對主人公作威作福的流氓貴族家-被人欺負的平民僕人的女兒?!

但是因為在臨死之前加入了<附身生命保險套餐>得到了特級特惠…從追星中獲得的直覺和保險特惠，神的偏愛寵愛在充滿地瓜的S級生存的故事!

---

column28: description:{"en":"Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as \"ghouls
column29: \" who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki
column31: finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.\n\n[Written by MAL Rewrite]"
column33: criaturas conhecidas como \"Ghouls\" vivem entre os humanos e os devoram para sobreviver. Alheio a eles
column34: o jovem universitário Ken Kaneki leva uma vida pacata entre livros
column35: até que um trágico encontro o coloca diante desses seres e o obriga a lutar por sua humanidade."
column36: ru:"Раса гулей существует с незапамятных времен. Ее представители вовсе не против людей
column37: они их даже любят - преимущественно в сыром виде. Любители человечины внешне неотличимы от нас
column39: быстры и живучи - но их мало
column40: потому гули выработали строгие правила охоты и маскировки
column41: а нарушителей наказывают сами или по-тихому сдают борцам с нечистью. В век науки люди знают про гулей
column43: привыкли. Власти не считают людоедов угрозой
column45: рассматривают их как идеальную основу для создания суперсолдат. Эксперименты идут уже давно…  \n  \nНичего этого не ведал Канэки Кэн
column49: где парень подрабатывает официантом. Не думал Кэн

column21: description:{"en":"Having graduated from the prestigious Witchcraft Institute at the top of his class
column22: no job is out of reach for William Glenford. Fame
column25: but William dreams of only one thing: adventures.  \n  \nFinding companions in a run-of-the-mill guild with an up-and-coming party of girls including a cleric
column26: a martial artist and a beastman catgirl
column27: and being ranked the lowest at the entry level
column28: they immediately begin noticing that he's **grossly** overqualified for his role and rank… and that this mage may not be a mere \"mage\"
column30: national-level wizard.  \n  \nWill William adjust to his party
column31: or will the girls ever hope to catch up to him?   \nWill the girls accept him regardless of his overwhelming superiority
column32:
or will he always be the big fish in the small pond?  
  


---"
column33: es:"Habiéndose graduado de la prestigiosa Academia de Brujería a la cabeza de su grado
column34: no hay ninguna ocupación que esté fuera del alcance de William Glenford. La fama
column35: la fortuna y el prestigio están a sus pies
column36: pero William sueña con una sola cosa: aventuras.  \n  \nHallando acompañantes en un gremio común de aventureros
column37: sumándose a un equipo emprendedor de muchachas incluyendo a una clérigo
column38: una artista marcial y una chica gato bestial
column39: y estando en el rango más bajo al nivel de amateur
column40: se empiezan a dar cuenta de que él está apabullantemente sobrecalificado para su rol y rango… y que este mago no es un mero \"mago\"
column41: sino un hechicero de talla nacional.  \n  \n¿Acaso William se ajustará a su equipo
column42: o acasó las chicas albergarán la esperanza de alcanzar su nivel?  \n¿Acaso las chicas le aceptarán sin tapujos acerca de su superioridad anonadante
column43: o será el siempre el pez grande en la laguna pequeña?"}

column39: description:{"en":"Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka
column40: living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics
column42: a loving emperor as a father
column45: any girl could ever hope to have. Now
column49: and if her hair weren't so red…  \nBut her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves
column51: murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona
column52:
and they lead a life on the run from that point on.  
  


---"
column54: 2.000 tahun yang lalu Kerajaan Kouka didirikan dan diperintah oleh seekor naga merah yang turun ke Bumi dari Surga berubah menjadi manusia dengan nama Hiryuu. Di sisinya
column55: empat prajurit yang dijiwai dengan darah naga dari para Dewa yang membantunya memimpin kerajaan menuju kemakmuran. Waktu berlalu
column56: dan kisah ini menjadi legenda untuk diceritakan kepada anak-anak. 2.000 tahun kemudian
column57: kerajaan tidak memiliki ahli waris laki-laki kecuali seorang putri tunggal bernama Yona yang hidup dalam kemewahan. Jatuh cinta dengan sepupunya
column61: dia memiliki semua yang dia inginkan dan terlindung dari kenyataan mengerikan di luar tembok kastil. Bertentangan dengan ilusi damai ini
column62: Kouka mengalami pergolakan politik dari dalam kerajaan. Setelah Su-won yang dicintainya melakukan kudeta berdarah dan membunuh ayahnya
column63: Yona terpaksa melarikan diri hanya dengan Hak di sisinya dan mulai menjalani kehidupan dalam pelarian. Meskipun dikelilingi oleh musuh di semua sisi
column64: putri yang dibuang itu masih ingin menyelamatkan kerajaannya. Solusinya datang dari seorang pendeta yang diasingkan
column65: yang mengatakan kepadanya bahwa satu-satunya harapannya adalah menemukan empat prajurit naga legendaris. Dipandu oleh mitos yang tampaknya fiktif ini
column66: Yona berangkat untuk menemukan para pejuang ini
column68: dan memulihkan kerajaan sambil menjalin pertemanan dan sekutu baru di sepanjang jalan."
column71: era apaixonada pelo seu primo e tinha uma vida luxuosamente despreocupada

column75: ru:"Йона — единственная принцесса королевства Коука. Она ведет роскошную и беззаботную жизнь
column76: как и подобает принцессам. У неё есть всё: лучшая одежда и косметика
column79: и сильнейшие чувства к кузену Су Вону
column80: о котором многие могли лишь мечтать. Вот только если бы её телохранитель Сон Хак не так раздражал и её волосы не были такими красными.   \nВсе меняется в ночь на шестнадцатый день рождения девушки. Почти идеальный мир быстро рассыпается
column82: которого она любит — Су Вон — убил её отца. Путь к его становлению на престол ныне гарантирован. Вместе с Хаком
column83: Йона скрылась из замка в поисках помощи
column84: и с этого момента они ведут жизнь в бегах…"}

column18: will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is."}

人类已灭亡？！
怪物肆虐，人类被迫成为游戏玩家。当游戏结束时世界只剩我一个幸存者，还被系统告知——单人模式结束，DLC商店开启。我竟然回到了游戏的第一天！

column14: description:{"en":"Civil engineering student and reknowned bridge otaku Youichi helps a swan stuck on the scaffolding for a bridge under construction
column15: only to be visited that night by Miwa
column16: a beautiful woman claiming to be the same swan Youichi rescued. Miwa stays with Youichi in order to pay back her debt
column19: less than convinced that she is what she says she is. But
column20: Youichi not being one to look a gift swan in the beak
column21: or more importantly not one to leave a woman in need hanging
column22: things soon develop in the way you might imagine.  \n(Then again
column23: maybe not exactly like you imagine…)"

column32: como Youichi no es de los que miran al cisne regalado en el pico
column33: o lo que es más importante
column34: no es de los que dejan a una mujer necesitada tirada
column35: las cosas pronto se desarrollan de la manera que te imaginas.  \n(Por otra parte
column36: tal vez no exactamente como te imaginas…)"

"그건 당신이 더 잘 알겠지
column42:
이 하반신으로 생각하는 짐승 새끼야."

column47: e a mulher com quem ele teve um caso apareceu novamente na minha frente. Além disso
column48:
não tenho muito tempo de vida.

"Vamos nos divorciar."

"...O quê."

"Eu não tenho um único centavo para te dar
column49: então tire tudo que eu comprei para você e vá embora. Ei
column50:
quero dizer tudo. Isso inclui sua cueca também."

"Por que você está fazendo isso de repente?"

" De repente?"

Eu tinha um sorriso torto no rosto. Sempre soube que ele era uma pessoa sem-vergonha
column51: mas isso é um pouco demais.\n\n\"Você deveria saber disso mais do que eu
column52:

column58:
zh:"重生后，前生出轨的丈夫一如既往的想要搞外遇，那个可恶的绿茶女再次出现在我面前，而我也命不久矣。 “我们离婚吧！” “什么？” “我不会给你一分钱，带着你的女人一起滚出我家。” “你为什么突然这样？” “你居然说突然？” 我被气笑了，虽然本来就知道他厚颜无耻。 “你不应该更清楚么，你这只会用下半身思考的禽兽！” 这辈子，我绝对不会再忍下去！

column60:
zh-hk:"重生回到過去，出軌的老公和小三又出現在我面前，而且我可以活的日子不多了。
“我們離婚吧”“什麼”“我一分都不會給你的，把我給你買的東西留下然後離開，我說的是全部，包括你的底褲”
“你怎麼突然這樣？”“突然？”我臉上帶著微笑，我知道他是個不要臉的人，沒想到他這麼不要臉。
“因為什麼，你應該很清楚，你這個混蛋”我決定重生後的日子不再裝看不見，狠狠報復這個混蛋！

---

column20: description:{"en":"Young lady Calliope has suffered through nature's law and many accidents. Her family was decimated by ruin and an ongoing war
column21: but upon listening to her melancholic singing upon the family's graveyard
column22: a mysterious womanly figure tells her that she'll reward her for the beautiful song
column23: and shrouds Calliope in darkness. Upon awakening
column24: Calliope finds that she traveled back in time to when she was born! While Calliope slowly grows
column25:
will she be able to figure out who killed her family and stop them in time?  


---"
column26:
fa:"[right]⁧⁧ بانوی جوانی به نام کالیوپ از حوادث طبیعی زیادی در حال رنج کشیدنه، خانواده‌‌ی بانوی جوان نابود و جنگ هم در حال پیشرویه، زمانی که برای سوگواری غریبه‌ها به گورستان میره و آوازی برای‌ روح اون غریبه‌ها می‌خونه، ناگهان زنی مرموز ظاهر می‌شه،"برای آواز زیبایی که برای من خوندی بهت هدیه‌ای میدم، پس بیشتر برام آواز بخون." ، ناگهان وقتی چشماش رو باز می‌کنه میبینه دوباره در حال بدنیا اومدنه… می‌فهمه که هدیه اون زن مرموز بازگشت اون به زندگی قبلی‌ش و برگردوندن زمانه، "این دفعه نمی‌ذارم اون حوادث تکرار بشن."، یعنی می‌تونه از اتفاق افتان اون حوادث جلوگیری کنه؟ همراه ما باشید تا در کنار هم شاهد داستان زیبای این بانوی کوچک باشیم .[/right]  


---"

column12: description:{"en":"Riku experienced a lot of pain and tragedy in his early life. After his father's death
column13: a former-boxer Yakuza man taught him how to do a basic punch
column14: and that punch saved his life when he had to defend himself from his mom's drug dealer. He ended up taking the drug dealer's life
column15: marking him as a killer. Criminals continued to come after him
column16: leading to more tragedy for the people who attempted to care for him. All of this drove him to ask that same former boxer to teach him to become stronger
column17: which led him to a rundown gym
column18:
his door to the world of pro boxing!  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In french by [Kazé](http://manga.kaze.fr/catalogue/ri_ku_la_rage_aux_poings) as "Riku-Do
column19: La rage aux poings\"  \n- In italian by [J-Pop](https://www.j-pop.it/855-rikudo)"
column21: un chico que ha perdido a su padre
column23: un antiguo boxeador que se dedica a cobrar deudas. En un mundo lleno de sinrazón
column24: ¿qué utiliza la gente como guía para sobrevivir? ¿Pelearán? ¡Esta es la historia de la increíble lucha a puñetazos de Riku Akutou mientras recorre el espinoso camino de la vida!　El chico no tiene nada. Excepto por sus puños."
column25: es-la:"Riku experimentó mucho dolor y tragedia en sus primeros años de vida. Tras la muerte de su padre

"Alright
column12:
I'll leave."

Catherine was tired of everything.

***

"Are you the Pope's watchdog? You've done well coming all the way here."

The man who intruded her home was drenched from head to toe.
She could see mud squished beneath his black leather boots.

Unbelievable.
To think he would drag in not grass
column14:
while she was cleaning the floors!

"You've got quite the disguise. Even I was almost fooled into thinking that you're just an ordinary city woman---"
"Wipe it."

She pushed the rag she held onto the man.

"Why are you looking at me so foolishly? I told you to wipe the floor. And it's not proper to show your sword when it's our first time meeting each other. Is it not enough that you intruded that you would want to be reported for attempted murder?""

This is a book compiling the "Shokuba no Senpai" series posted on Twitter.
This includes a newly illustrated story with a total of 33 pages: it's Episode #01 fully depicted in R-18 form.
(Source: [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=994997))

Contains 10 stories combined into one book:
1. Would You Like Another Drink?
2. Senpai And Today's Second "Good Morning"
3. Opposite Effect
4. After Drinking at Senpai's Place
5. Senpai And Business Trip
6. Senpai Wants To Go to The Ocean
7. Senpai And The Ocean
8. Senpai And The First Time...
9. Senpai Didn't Have The Luxury To That Time
10. ~Beginning to End of the First Night~ (New)(R18)

---

Notes:
Stories #1-9 are Twitter shorts
column14: story #10 is a 33-page new illustration and chronologically a full R-18 depiction of story #1.\nBoth the raw and the scans are combined into a single
column15: 70 page doujin release.\nLive-action JAV adaptation:  URE-095"

ja:"ヒロイン×悪役令嬢を中心とした女性同士の物語を集めた小説家になろう発アンソロジー!
ALLハッピーエンドの読み切り5本収録!! いずれも『小説家になろう』発の大人気作です!
王子様と幸せになるだけがハッピーエンドじゃない!
婚約破棄からのヒロイン×悪役令嬢ルートを中心に、ざまぁ、断罪イベント、GL、乙女ゲーム、友情END、百合END、主従ENDなどが楽しめます♪
カバーイラスト：まろ

**第1巻の内容：**
1. 『ヒロインの攻略対象は……』　漫画：かわのあきこ　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8335ef/)：yui/サウスのサウス
悪役令嬢が婚約破棄された時、王子に呼ばれたヒロインの行動は!?
2. 『婚約破棄されたお嬢様が大変そうなので助けに入りました』　漫画：大庭そと　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9459fo/)：りんご飴ツイン
お仕えしているお嬢様が目の前で婚約破棄され!?
3. 『婚約破棄されました。私の親友が!必ず阻止します!……私が原因なのでorz』　漫画：わに　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3379dw/)： naturalsoft
悪役令嬢と親友になって断罪回避と思ったのに!?
4. 『悪役令嬢との友情ルート』　漫画：ほしな　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9052ee/)：大小判
転生したヒロインの目的は悪役令嬢の救済!? 原作知識を使って悪役令嬢に近づき…。
5. 『“悪役"令嬢の婚約破棄、もしくは〈黒の聖女〉顛末記~another story~』　漫画：むらさき　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7544cy/)：ふじやま
悪役令嬢の行動のすべてはヒロインの為に――…。

**第2巻の内容：**
1. 『悪役令嬢は天使のようなライバル美少女に愛を誓われる』　漫画：道雪葵
2. 『悪役令嬢に転生したので、国外追放回避の為ヒロインに優しく接したいが、ヒロインが鈍臭くてボケボケなので厳しく接してツッコミまくっていたら、案の定卒業パーティーで婚約者である王子から断罪されている最中です』　漫画：かしい葵　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6610gi/)：もんちゃん
3. 『「愛することはない」と言われましても、そもそもその必要はございません。』　漫画：マナタマユム　　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2695hy/)：鰯づくし
4. 『平民の私が高慢な悪役令嬢に絡まれているのですが、どうすればいいですか？』　漫画：ほしな　　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2667gs/)：りんご飴ツイン
5. 『わたくしこそが王となりますゆえ、此度の縁談はお断りさせていただきますわ。かわいい妹が待っておりますの』　漫画：冬芽沙也　[原作](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1179hz/)：中村朱里"

신들의 권능을 받은 '플레이어'들이 등장했다. 

 이세준. 세상을 구원할 메시아 길드의 수장.
"저와 함께 세상을 구합시다. 이 악몽에 종지부를 찍읍시다."
영웅의 등장에 온 세상이 열광했고
column22:
나는 그의 동료가 되었다. 

 하지만……

 인류가 구세주로 떠받들던 그는 영웅이 아니라
column23:
세상을 지배하고자 야욕을 품었던 간웅이었다.
“그동안 수고했다. 네가 아니었다면 여기까지 올 수 없었겠지.”
최후의 던전에서 나는 그 놈의 칼에 목숨을 잃었다.

 …라고 생각했다.

 죽음의 순간
column24:
내 귓가에 들려온 알림음.
[게임을 시작합니다.]
나는 플레이어로 각성하기 전의 과거로 되돌아 왔다.

 그리고 이제는
column25:
내가 놈을……

 '사냥' 할 차례다.

column18: ja:"彼氏をネットゲームで知り合った他の女に取られた茜。ストレス発散に雑魚モンスターを狩っていると、ギルドメンバーのアフロ男・山田に声をかけられる。同じギルメンの誼でフラれたことを愚痴るも、山田は無表情で「興味ない」とそっけない返事。挙句に「狩場を譲れ」と言う山田に「これだからゲームする男なんて！」とキレる茜だったが、好きなゲームをフラれっぱなしでやめられないと一念発起。ネトゲのリアルイベントが開催されることを知った茜は元彼に会えるかも……とお洒落をして会場に乗り込むが、元彼の横には新しい彼女の姿が……。直後、人混みに押され転んでしまった茜に手を差し伸べたのは超イケメンの黒髪男子。しかしそんなイケメンの無愛想な態度と「興味ない」という言葉で頭に浮かんだのはあのアフロ頭のアバター……この眼の前にいるイケメンこそあの山田だった!?　目の前で元カレのイチャコラを見せつけられた茜は山田を居酒屋に連行してヤケ酒に付き合わせる。酔いつぶれた茜が目を覚ますと、そこは見知らぬ場所……山田の部屋だった。もしかして私……!?"}

column21:
description:{"en":"15 years ago the world discovered magic as well as mythical beings (basically beings from various legends) in another dimension. Humankind learned to summon these dangerous mythical beings and use their power to great effect. 7 countries formed contracts with these "Diva" and gained their alligence as a result. Diva will chose their summoners on their 14th birthday and give them a stigma. Schools have been set up to train summoners and magical swordsman (basically bodyguards that give the summoners time to cast their spell) as a result.  
  
15 years later after the finding of magic Hayashizaki Kazuki is chosen as a summoner and given a stigma to indicate that. This is surprising since males aren't chosen as summoners due to their low amount of mana compared to females. As the first male to be a summoner Kazuki is under a lot of scrutiny by almost everyone.  
  
To complicate matters his sister (who's a magical swordsman) is against him going into summoner school to train there as a summoner. Because summoners and magical swordsman have a cat mouse thing going on where summoners look down on magical swordsman as inferior so his sister naturally is against him going there. She'll stop him even if it means going to war.  
  
Kazuki however is determined to thrive in summoner school and have already determined to give it his all. Even if he's the lowest ranked student (ranked E) and his fellow students intend to demean him he'll prove himself as the strongest summoner.  
  
Adaptation of the light novel written by Mihara Mitsuki and illustrated by CHuN.  
  
The manga is published in Monthly Comic Alive

a seinen manga magazine by Media Factory.

column83: making them the elite among elite. But it’s lonely at the top and each has fallen for the other. There’s just one huge problem standing in the way of lovey-dovey bliss—they’re both too prideful to be the first to confess their romantic feelings and thus become the “loser” in the competition of love! And so begins their daily schemes to force the other to confess first!"

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)"}

column31: description:{"en":"Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan
column32: Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17
column33: Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However
column34: the Tokugawa win a crushing victory
column35: leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However
column37:
Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category."
column38: es:"Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI
column39: Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años
column40: Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo
column41: los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria
column42: lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo
column44:
Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista."

ja:"貧しい下級貴族の息子テオドール・ミラー。 彼は、実力を重んじるベルゲンアカデミーに通っているものの、 魔力がないせいで5年通ってもまだ3年生という落第生だった。 筆記の成績は優秀だが、実技の成績次第では卒業できないかもしれない。 生徒や先生からは、学習能力は高いけど魔力のない落ちこぼれだと冷やかされる始末。 そんな彼を信じてくれる人はビンス教授だけだった。 ある日、デオドールは図書館で未知の生物｢グラトニー｣を発見する。 グラトニーはテオドールの左手に寄生して魔導書や魔道具を食べ、なんとテオドールはその魔力や知識を自分の物にできるようになった——！ グラトニーにエサを与えながら力をつけていったテオドールは、 ビンス教授の勧めで首都で行われる魔法コンテストに出場することになる。 魔法学会主催の第3級以上の大会で入賞すれば いつでも好きな時にアカデミーを卒業できる資格を得られる。 テオドールは無事に大会で入賞し、ベルゲンアカデミーを卒業出来るのか⁉ 落ちこぼれだった過去に決着をつけ、魔法師になることができるのだろうか!?

column16: description:{"en":"What does one consider to be a monster? A horrible bloodsucking vampire? Frankenstein's creation? Shuichi Kagaya has a secret. Other than having great grades and being skilled at sports
column17: he isn’t what one would call normal. In fact
column18: Shuichi cannot even be considered human. One fateful morning
column19: he woke up as a monster. With brute strength
column20: an abnormally strong sense of smell
column22: and the depression and self-hate that comes after losing one's humanity
column23: his life was suddenly flipped upside down. Claire Aoki
column24: the girl he had decided to save
column25: now holds his secret over his head. Claire is a sadistic and utterly twisted girl
column26: with no sense of empathy toward the lives of others. Before meeting Shuichi
column27: she was in the search of monsters
column28: hoping to find her monster sister. Despite becoming a monster
column29: Shuichi naively continues to hold onto his human morals
column30: but how long can one last in this insufferable way of living?"}

zh:"弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

the heart-broken Gal* by **Amagi Yuzu**

column22: но болезнь приковывает его к постели и ему приходится познать весь ужас одиночества в незнакомой стране. Когда жар немного спадает
column24: в чьих коридорах сразу же теряется. Путешествуя по музею в состоянии бреда
column25: он познаёт историю экспонатов самого посещаемого музея
column26: без возможности отделить галлюцинации от реального мира. Всё это даёт герою возможность общаться с не только со знаковыми личностями мира искусства из разных эпох... но и с Хранителями Лувра."}

column7: description:{"en":"A fearless Yakuza named Sudou decides to leave his life of crime when he finds out his clan is disbanding. However
column8: his strong sense of justice and huge tattoos intefere with this goal
column9: and he struggles to keep any job he finds.   \nThat is
column10: until an ex-underling gives him the idea to start writing manga.  \nAfter becoming a big hit on social media
column12: and he… somehow ends up working in the BL department?!  \nBecause this ex-Yakuza doesn't know the first thing about BL
column14: sadistic editor starts to coach him — thus beginning a tough
column17: decide dejar su vida criminal cuando se da cuenta que su clan se va a disolver. Sin embargo
column18: su fuerte sentido de justicia y grandes tatuajes interfieren en su meta
column19: y batalla para conservar los trabajos que encuentra.   \nDespues de convertirse popular en las redes sociales
column21: y … ¡¿De alguna manera termina trabajando en el departamento de BL?!  \nDebido a que este ex-Yakuza no comprende los principios del BL
column22: un frio y sadico editor empieza a entrenarlo — y asi dan paso a las duras clases prácticas… ☆☆||"}

column24: description:{"en":"As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins
column25: Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She
column26: who only had one hobby of painting
column27: found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan
column28:
she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady
column30: I'll agree to annul the engagement.\"\n\nBut
column31: she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him
column32:
and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life
column33: Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings
column34: forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year
column35: she offers a deal to her fiancé
column37: with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise
column38:
their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

column53:
è andata a trovare il suo fidanzato che conosceva a malapena... Per annullare il fidanzamento come aveva sempre voluto.

"...Mia Signora
column55: accetterò di annullare il fidanzamento.\"\n\nMa allora non lo sapeva. Che avrebbe ricevuto l'amore incondizionato che non aveva mai ricevuto per tutta la vita da lui

column59:
ja:"家門の跡を継ぐ長子でも、家族の愛を独占できる末っ子でもない、中途半端な2番目として、いつも誰かの影で生きてきたカリナ。 絵を描くことが唯一の趣味だった彼女は、自分に残された時間があと少しだということを知り、今まで交流もなかった婚約者に会いに行くことに。 婚約破棄の書類を胸に抱いて… 「ここにいさせてください」 「正気か？」 「その代わり…婚約を破棄して差し上げます」 この時は思いもしなかった。あれほど望んだ無償の愛と関心を彼がくれることになるなんて。 そのせいで、どうでもよかった人生に未練を抱くことになるなんて…

column63: 귀여움을 독차지하는 막내도 되지 못한 어중간한 둘째로
column64:
평생 다른 사람들에게 가려진 삶을 살아온 카리나. 
그림을 그리는 것만이 유일한 취미인 그녀는
자신에게 남은 시간이 고작 1년 뿐이라는 사실을 알게 된다. 

그래서 교류도 없던 약혼자를 무작정 찾아갔다.
그가 원하던 파혼 서류를 품에 고이 간직한 채.

"단도직입적으로 말하자면
column66:
영애?" 
“대신 파혼해 드릴게요.”

하지만 그땐 미처 알지 못했다. 
평생 가지지 못했던 대가 없는 관심과 애정을 그에게 받게 될 줄은.
그래서 미련 없던 삶에 이토록 욕심이 생기게 될 줄은.

column78: я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи

column20: description:{"en":"The Man-Killer Virus: a lethal disease that has eradicated 99.9% of the world's male population. Mizuhara Reito has been in cryogenic sleep for the past five years
column22: the girl of his dreams. When Reito awakens from the deep freeze
column23: he emerges into a sex-crazed new world where he himself is the planet's most precious resource. Reito and four other male studs are given lives of luxury and one simple mission: repopulate the world by impregnating as many women as possible! All Reito wants
column25: is to find his beloved Erisa who went missing three years ago. Can Reito resist temptation and find his one true love?"
column26: es-la:"El virus mata a los hombres: una enfermedad letal que ha erradicado el 99
column27: 9% de la población masculina del mundo. Mizuhara Reito ha estado en sueño criogénico durante los últimos cinco años
column29: la chica de sus sueños. Cuando Reito despierta del congelamiento

column11:
it turns out "alchemy" is the most powerful skill that allows him to create everything from a holy sword to flying ships! This cheat skill he unexpectedly acquired turns him into a wealthy merchant and makes him undefeatable in battles! A heartwarming adventure story about (possibly) the most powerful alchemist in another world!

*Alpha Manga*
